ehidi galla kridanganaye idikirim sandaha awasara nomathi bawata nagarika sanwardhana adhikariya adahas pala kara athi athara, owun pawasa aththe galu kridanganaya idikirimedi yunesko sanwidhanaye awasaraya da labagena nomathi bawatayi.mema sakachchawedi pamini ekangathawayan thawaduratath thahawuru kirima sandaha mita dina dekakata peradi amathyansha lekamwarunge sakachchawa pawathwa thibenawa.ehidi galla jathyanthara krikat kridanganaye athi idikirim iwath kara eya mahajana kridanganayak bawata path kirimata awasan washayen ekangathawayakata pamina athi bawa sandahan.me sambandhayen apa galla jathyanthara krikat kridanganaya bharawa sitina paripalana niladharingen wimasa siti athara owun prakasha kale mema kridanganayata aluthin idikirimata yojitha nagarika sanwardhana adhikariyata ayath pinnaduwe pihiti bhumiya idiri sathiyaka kalasimawa thula nirikshanaya kirimata balaporoththu wana bawayi.aluthin kridanganayak idikirimata rupiyal miliyana 700 ka mudalak waya wana bawin ehi awashyathawa pilibanda yali wimasa baliya yuthu bawa da galla jathyanthara krikat kridanganaye ema jyeshta niladhariya apa kala wimasimedi wadiduratath kiya sitiya.
